properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (RegistryValueData contains "00000429" or RegistryValueData contains "00050429" or RegistryValueData contains "0000042a") and (RegistryKey contains "\\Keyboard Layout\\Preload" or RegistryKey contains "\\Keyboard Layout\\Substitutes")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the keyboard preload installation with a suspicious keyboard layout, e.g. Chinese, Iranian or Vietnamese layout load in user session on systems maintained by US staff only
